properties.body:
SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
VESSEL, WHITE HULL, 16 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT VICINITY 40-00N 019-00E. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
